body:
While investigating #12797 I noticed that `spack config blame` was reporting wrong information on what was set by what.

### Spack version
```console
$ spack --version
0.14.0-90-c0032a3
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue
Edit `${spack_root}/etc/spack/config.yaml` to contain:
```yaml
config:
  install_hash_length: 8
```
the try to ask Spack about `config.yaml`:
```console
$ spack config blame config
---                                                                                 config:
_builtin                                                                              debug: False
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:81     connect_timeout: 10
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:86     verify_ssl: True
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:105    checksum: True
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:110    dirty: False
_builtin                                                                              build_jobs: 16
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:62     build_stage:
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:63     - $tempdir/$user/spack-stage
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:64     - ~/.spack/stage
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:64     # - $spack/var/spack/stage
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:64   
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:64   
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:19     # Cache directory for already downloaded source tarballs and archived
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:23     # repositories. This can be purged with `spack clean --downloads`.
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:23     install_tree: $spack/opt/spack
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:24     template_dirs:
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:28     - $spack/share/spack/templates
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:32   
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:33   
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:34     # Default directory layout
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:70     install_path_scheme: ${ARCHITECTURE}/${COMPILERNAME}-${COMPILERVER}/${PACKAGE}-${VERSION}-${HASH}
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:75     module_roots:
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:94       tcl: $spack/share/spack/modules
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:100      lmod: $spack/share/spack/lmod
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:118    source_cache: $spack/var/spack/cache
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:127    misc_cache: ~/.spack/cache
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:139    suppress_gpg_warnings: False
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:146    install_missing_compilers: False
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:154    build_language: C
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml:159    locks: True
/davide/home/userexternal/mculpo02/github/spack/etc/spack/config.yaml:2               ccache: False
```
The last line is clearly wrong.

### Error Message
No error message, just wrong output. Internally the data structures and query seems to be working correctly:
```python
$ spack-python
Spack version 0.14.0
Python 3.6.8, Linux ppc64le
>>> import spack.config
>>> spack.config.get('config:install_hash_length')
8
```

### Information on your system
This happened on both an `x86_64` and a `ppc64le` platform, making me think it's not platform specific.

### General information

- [x] I have run `spack --version` and reported the version of Spack
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
- [x] I have run the failing commands in debug mode and reported the output
title: Wrong output from 'spack config blame'
